flex_direction.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] CSS flex-direction for horizontal button layout. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.

align_items.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] CSS align-items for horizontal button alignment. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.

justify_content.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] CSS justify-content for button positioning. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.

gap.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] CSS gap between buttons in compact layout

width.$description: [NO-FIGMA-SUPPORT] CSS width for buttons - auto lets them hug content. HTML/CSS implementation only - use button.container component variants in Figma.
